Question.Subject: chatroulette not working?
Question.Content: whenever i try to go on chatroulette, nomatter how many times i try to go on, the brower doesnt respond and then i have to close the browser i was on. Anyone help?
Question.ChosenAnswer: It's not related to your computer nor to your browser. Chatroulette server is too busy. Wait till tomorrow : it'll be less crowded. It's sunday : people want to show their dicks before going back to work on monday.

Answer.Content:
not working... for troubleshooting steps go to this blog.
www.computernett.blogspot.com

It's not related to your computer nor to your browser. Chatroulette server is too busy. Wait till tomorrow : it'll be less crowded. It's sunday : people want to show their dicks before going back to work on monday.
